reviews.review_text: Great experience, from the time that I took the complimentary shadow from the Airport to The hotel Holiday Inn Express Richmond, the driver Dean, Dean, he was very nice and courteous,  he gave me a lot of information of how to get around the hotel, restaurants and places to visit,  The staff at Front Desk where nice and professional. The rooms are nice clean and comfortable, Breakfast was good and enough to get you started and ready for your day. I stayed here 2 weekends in a row total of 4 nights. The housekeeper Li (both w-ends) was very nice and friendly. The hotel is well located, conveniently close to the airport (24/7 complimentary shuttle or if you are driving secure parking is available) close to the Bridgeport Station (about 10 minutes walk) where you can take the TransLink Metro, Vancouvers transportation network, it will allow you to go anywhere, either by train or bus. Next door to the hotel there is Costco, and a few restaurants that are walking distance. Rooms: Rooms are nice, clean and very comfortable. Food & drinks: Good breakfast to start your day. Few restaurants within walking distance. Noteworthy details: From the hotel location, you have access to the Bridgeport Station (10 minutes walk) and go anywhere from there.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Tani Jesus Garcia, We appreciate you providing a detailed overview of your recent stay with us. We are delighted to hear you have enjoyed your accommodation, please think of us again the next time you are visiting the area. Regards Eric Li Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Top notch people as staff here, friendly even helped me when my hands were full by setting my floor level in elevator.  Loved how they went above and beyond then respected our space when napping. Great location, buttery soft beds, pillows and bedding. Great products in the room for our comfort. Continental breakfast was actually cooked in kitchen, meals, food prep and serving set up was all immaculate. Best hotel stay yet. Rooms: Roomy, gorgeous lighting, work desk and office chair, comfortable, white noise machine ( not needed as it was quiet) Walkability: Near all major bus and train routes, short walk to places. Food & drinks: Everything you may need.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Josephine Burrows, Thank you so much for your kind words. We are thrilled to hear that your stay with us was your best hotel experience yet. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Very clean place and nice friendly staff. Their tea/coffee station is open 24 hours and they also have chocolate chip cookies that are super yummy. Breakfast included. Shuttle to the airport available. I highly recommend this place and will definitely come back the next time I m in town.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Quynh, Nguyen, We are pleased to hear you have enjoyed your stay, thank you for selecting our hotel. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: There were a couple of restaurants across the street  from the hotel one a Shanghai restaurant and the other a Hong Kong restaurant. We enjoyed the Hong Kong one the night we stayed at the hotel. The shuttle bus to the airport was great! We had an early flight and the shuttle made it really easy to get to the airport.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Lora, We are pleased to hear you have enjoyed your stay, thank you for selecting our hotel. Regards Eric Li Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Good hotel. Nice and clean room. Nice view. Close to airport. Shuttle service was on time and good. Especial as we got in at 12:30 AM. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Average breakfast but breakfast staff were also great. Close to subway to downtown. But downtown and port is a half hour away So be aware of that if youre looking to sightsee.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Randy M, We appreciate the high rating, thank you again for selecting our hotel. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Very clean, spacious room with fridge, coffee machine, TV. Safe in room but ours out of order. Not an issue. Simple breakfast included. Coffee, tea and cookies available 24/7 in reception. Shuttle to/from airport very good. Location is some distance from Vancouver downtown but skytrain about 10-15 min walk. Not a lot in the area but do research for local restaurants as some good options.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Bob Butler, We appreciate the high rating, thank you again for selecting our hotel. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Convenient location w/ free shuttle to/from airport. Friendly services and free breakfast. Room is modern, albeit a bit small. Walkable to nearby restaurants and Richmond night market. Will stay again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello amie k, We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback on your recent stay. Thank you again for selecting our hotel. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Decent location. The bathroom was a bit dated with flaking bathtub, but otherwise the room was big and nice. Good breakfast with a lot of items. The main concern we had when booking this hotel was the noise (we are generally quite sensitive to noise during sleep), but it wasnt a big deal at all during our 3-night stay. All the rooms are facing the highway, I believe, so there wasnt any road noise. We didnt hear any airplane noise either. Some of the reviews have mentioned the truck unloading noise at the Costco right next to it, but I dont think I heard that before 9 AM, and with the white noise machine on, I dont think any noise outside would have impacted our sleep. Rooms: The room was spacious. Food & drinks: There were plenty of food options for the free breakfast. The best among the hotels Ive stayed at in the past year that offer free breakfast.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Yunfan Yu, Thank you for the high rating. We appreciate the kind feedback. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Staff was great, had early flight out at 3 am, opened kitchen early for snacks and coffee and also paid for shuttle to airport. Thank you! Rooms
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Michael L, We value your feedback, thank you for the top rating! Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Booked this primarily because it was close to the Bridgeport Skytrain station (8 mins walk) and also because we enjoyed our stays at other Holiday Inns. The rooms were spacious and clean with tons of electrical outlets to charge. Showers had adjustable water pressure. Service was great; parking was only $10/night. Breakfast for us was free and the variety was pretty good! There was also a cool pancake making machine. Beds were a bit too soft for our likings (we have a medium firm bed at home) and the walls were a little thin (we could hear the kids and water from our neighboring room). Surprisingly, airplane sounds did not bother us at all.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Andrew H, Thank you for the 5/5 rating. We appreciate the kind feedback! Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Friendly staff, 24 hours free Airport shuttle. Clean rooms. Free breakfast- though just mediocre quality. Only set back - prices fluctuates a lot , at times can be more expensive than other comparable or better standard hotels nearby. Rooms : 5/5
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Andrew Tan, We appreciate the high rating, thank you again for selecting our hotel. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: The room was very clean and spacious. The staff were very helpful and accommodating. Easily walkable from public transportation. The only downfall was airplane noise.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Cori Folk, Thank you for the high rating. We appreciate the kind feedback. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: I ve stayed at this hotel on a few occasions and it s always been an excellent experience. The rooms are modern, clean and very quiet. The staff and nice and the breakfast is good! The only real drawback is there isn t much around the hotel (other than Costco).
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Brendan Yanta, Thank you for the high rating. We appreciate the kind feedback. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Rooms were great, they let us check in early (9:50 am) and they even allow us to eat breakfast when we check in
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Tantalay Termvanich, We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback of your recent stay, thank you again for selecting our hotel. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: An overall wonderful experience. We had to fly to Philippines and had nowhere to park our truck for the month-long that we will be gone and no other hotel will let you park your car that long in the vicinity other than the Holiday Inn. The staff were very helpful in answering and accomodating all our queries and gave us a very reasonable price as well for the whole month that we will have to leave our truck. It was also a great and secured area so it gave us peace of mind  while we were away. Location is very convenient as well as its just near the airport. Just right across the hotel is Costco if you needed something and some restaurants as well. They also serve complimentary breakfast which exceeded my expectation. All in all, it was a great and stress-free experience during our stay and will definitely come back if ever we are in the area again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Maria Bush, Thank you for this wonderful review. We truly pride ourselves on outstanding service, and we are glad we delivered on that. We can t wait to welcome you back for another trip away. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Very nice room! It seems pretty new to us. Within a few miles of the airport.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Jay Ripley, We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback on your recent stay. Thank you again for selecting our hotel. Regards Eric Li Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Really good hotel. Location closed to Canada line and has a bus line to Aberdeen. Costco is next to the hotel. The room is very clean and comfortable.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Eddie Li, We appreciate the feedback. Thank you again for selecting our hotel. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Excellent!!  We have a lifted pickup that is hard to fit into parkades and underground parking and we do not like parking on the street, this hotel offered a fenced, security gated parking lot to safely park our truck or long term parking when you need a park and fly option.  Breakfast was excellent!! We will definitely return!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Stephanie Nash, We are glad to hear you have enjoyed your stay. We will look forward to your next visit. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Staff were great!  Rooms clean. The breakfast bar was well stocked and the staff helpful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Melody Priestley, We are delighted to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. Please think of us again the next time you are visiting the Richmond area. Regard Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: The rooms were nice, spacious and clean. The beds and pillows were so comfortable! Try breakfast in the morning was great! Lastly, the location was close to the airport and there was a free shuttle service from the airport to the hotel.  The rooms were a great temperature, which was such a blessing. A bonus point, is they provided a notice maker in the room.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Heather Brooke-Ryan, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. A positive experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. Take care and stay safe. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: 3 Star hotels like this honestly make me wonder why I stay in 4+ hotels (a 4 star hotel I just came from had a washroom that smelt like bad laundry). If you dont need any fancy frills but want accommodating service, clean room/washroom, great bed and need to be close to the airport, this is it. Desk chair was even decent that I fell asleep watching the wall mounted TV that swivels. Staff easily booked a 4AM shuttle to the airport and light breakfast was ready even at that time (wish I couldve taken advantage of the main breakfast). If I had to be super picky, it was just slightly dim in terms of lighting in the main part of the room. Also, after checking in the cleaning lady(?) entered the room without knocking with a keycard which startled us but who wouldnt be.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello James Kim, Thank you for this terrific review and feedback of our hotel and our amenities. As a teachable moment, I have shared your comments with the appropriate hotel team to ensure the necessary guidelines are in place in order to prevent this mishap from ever happening again. We look forward to welcoming you back for whenever your plans bring you back to our city! Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Great rooms and a clean hotel. Breakfast was busy and tables needed more bussing. Location isnt great, but close to airport and free shuttle. How would I describe the hotel? Location to the airport and shopping.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Michael Beresfors, Thank you for the high rating. We appreciate the kind feedback. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Hotel is conveniently located near the YVR Airport and not too far from downtown Vancouver. Check in was a breeze; great staff that were light, friendly and very helpful. Room was clean and a decent size for the two day stay. Bed was comfortable. Room was relatively quiet (you were able to hear some folks in the hallway but nothing crazy). Only thing that would have been nice might have been a little extra water pressure in the shower. All in all, next time Im in Vancouver, this will be the rest stop!

A very nice hotel cause staff are helpful, rooms are nice and there are tons of amenities here.  Hot tub jets work well and is located right by an Imax! Pretty pricey though but for those who need a shuttle to airport this hotel has one and goes every hr on the hr. Thanks for a nice stay.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Nol P, We appreciate your feedback. Unfortunately, I believe you have the wrong property as we do not have a hot tub and are not close to Imax. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Very clean, best Holiday Inn Room Ive come across, service and customer care great.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello mal robert, We appreciate the top rating. Thank you for selecting our hotel. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: The room was super clean, and the staff was lovely and attentive. The bed was comfy as well. It s perfect for an evening before or after a flight since it s near the airport. I wouldn t hesitate to stay again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Barbara S, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. A positive experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to welcoming you back as soon as possible! Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Very pleasantly surprised at the calibre of this hotel for the price range. Excellent customer service, thoughtful room amenities like white noise machine and universal PC workstation, 24 hour free shuttle, free full breakfast, at a great value. Id recommend it if people are looking for an inexpensive over nighter near the airport, especially for those on business trips. Punches well above its weight class. (P.S. The free coffee made me do a double take - tastes pretty dang good, like diner coffee.)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello JJ Wytrwal, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Great value stay. The complimentary breakfast is excellent and plentiful. Coffee always on. Rooms are clean and I found the staff to be very helpful. The parking is easy.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Todd Bowden, Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We truly pride ourselves on outstanding service, and we are glad we could deliver on that. We look forward to welcoming you back as soon as possible! Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Vancouver hotels aren t cheap and neither is this hotel. However it was a great experience
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Ross, Thank you for sharing your thoughts on your recent stay at our hotel in Vancouver. We understand that Vancouver is known for its expensive hotels, and we appreciate your decision to choose us for your visit. Were delighted to hear that despite the cost, you had a great experience during your stay with us. Providing a memorable and enjoyable stay for our guests is our utmost priority, and its always rewarding to know that our efforts have made your visit special. Thank you for choosing us, and we hope to see you again soon. Regards, Jon Laqui Assistant General Manager

reviews.review_text: My partner and I stayed one night at the Holiday Inn Express, and we were quite happy with our stay. The room we stayed in was recently renovated, with a spacious bathroom, and was very clean (& we are quite picky about that). The beds were very comfortable! The staff were quite attentive and helpful with our questions. The complimentary breakfast was a bit lacklustre, but based on what we paid for our stay, it was much appreciated. Strongly recommend if you need a place to stay close to the airport!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Alex Zamora, Thank you for taking the time to write a 5-star review and for recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Exactly what I needed . After a 10 day trip through BC doing many activities I needed rest badly before catching my flight back to Ontario. This was one of best places I have actually stayed  considering all factors. Staff was super nice, helpful and accommodating. They let me check in early and when my room wasnt going to be ready they put me in something else and did not charge me for that. Breakfast was perfect for those mornings on the fly and the rooms were super clean. The beds and linen are what I look forward to the most in any hotel and I didnt want to get out of bed it was that good for me. Indoor parking was ample, secure and easy to use. The team here should be proud of what they have because my experience and other reviews support how well they do here Thanks and I will see you again when I need a spot before flying out of BC Cheers Dave B
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello David Bussieres, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: This hotel left a positive feeling after leaving we wanted to stay longer! The staff working here are A++++ such excellence service! The hotel is located right near the Sky train area and right across a Costco. The 2 queen beds were so comfy and room itself was nice. The airport shuttle services comes every 1/2 hour and it was on time! Every morning 6:30am-9:30am breakfast was served and it was clean and sanitary. The area and refills it was served in was so fast and good. I enjoyed my stay here and would def come back. Thank-you Holiday Inn Express Richmond Airport for your hospitality!! A+++++
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello JP Pham, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: We stayed here while my toddler was in and out of the BC Childrens Hospital and their customer service was beyond amazing.  Good breakfast, comfortable beds after long stressful days.  Would recommend to anyone.  Very helpful staff who go above and beyond.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Marcie Lundin, Thank you for your positive review of our hotel. Thank you so much for your staff comment, we truly pride ourselves on outstanding service, and we are glad we could deliver on that. We look forward to welcoming you back as soon as possible! Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Fairly priced with a stay & park package. Nice room, good airport shuttle, quiet, liquid creamer for the coffee (a small thing, but a nice surprise from the powdered stuff). The staff were friendly and very helpful. I wouldnt hesitate to stay here again if I have an early morning flight.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Colin, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: My family stayed here for a few nights. Joanna and Eric in particular were such a great help to us with some of our travel issues. We really appreciate the shuttle driver for accommodating our delayed evening flight. The other staff were super friendly and pleasant as well. There are great amenities in the rooms, even more than some other hotels I ve been at. The free breakfast is great with a good selection. There are pancakes, various proteins that change everyday, bread, fruits, and drinks. It s in a good area: the hotel is a 5-10 minute walk to the nearest transit station (depending on if you cut across the Costco parking lot), and it s across the street from a Costco and a great Chinese restaurant. The free shuttle only takes 10 minutes and it s fairly frequent. The only concern is the noise level, which is totally out of the staff s control. I could always hear things from the Costco loading dock, and since it s close to the airport we can hear planes all the time. Besides that, I would still highly recommend the hotel to everyone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Amy Kwan, Thank you for taking the time to write a 5-star review and for recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: This has to be the best Holiday Inn property that I have ever stayed at. Great front desk customer service..thank you Jon Eric. Lovely housekeeping, thanks Li for looking after our room during our stay. And surprisingly, the coffee offered was very nice. Its usually very weak but not here. Very well maintained and clean hotel, conveniently located to all amenities.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Summer Storm, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Amazing service! I booked late with a staff member named Jon at 2am after a cancelled flight to Australia. Emelyn was super helpful and was not even aware of my situation when I arrived. Super accommodating and set me up with food, water, and a free late check out. Very cheerful and welcoming staff the next day. Very impressed
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Performance Revolution, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. A positive experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. I will make sure to pass your kinds words to both Jhon and Emilyn. Take care and stay safe. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Great location shuttle to airport free breakfast friendly staff and the staff accompanied us a room with early check in from overnight flight definitely recommend anyone to stay here Rooms: Clean room Nearby activities: Lots restaurants Safety: Have to use key to use elevator Food & drinks: Excellent Noteworthy details: Trustable staff
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Desmond Davies, Thank you for the high rating. We appreciate the kind feedback. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: We had booked one night at this hotel to be near the airport for our flight home at the end of our vacation. Unfortunately my wife had a medical emergency the morning we were going to leave, requiring surgery and a lengthy hospital stay for her and extended stay at the hotel for me. All the staff was great, but a special shout out to Jon at the front desk, who rushed to our room to assist when I called 911 from the room phone. He also arranged for me to keep the room for the additional 7 nights. Thank you Jon, your help during that stressful time was very much appreciated. Since I was in the hotel much longer than expected, there were some other things about the hotel I appreciated: 1) the features of the room. Nice tv, fridge, microwave, coffee maker, lots of outlets and usb ports, a small window that actually opened, office desk area. 2) proximity to the sky train. It was about a 10 minute walk to the station. 3) coin op laundry machines. Needless to say, we didnt have a lot of clean clothes left since we were supposed to be at the end of our trip, so having laundry on site was a huge benefit. Again, thanks to Jon and the rest of the staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Rick Lawres, Thank you for taking the time to write a candid review. A positive experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. I will definitely pass along all your kind words to the rest of our staff. Take care and stay safe. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: My husband and I had a great experience with this hotel. Aside from the amenities, their customer service was great - they are accommodating towards reasonable requests and very helpful . The shuttle service to the airport and free breakfast makes your moneys worth . The bed is very comfortable ! We will for sure be staying here again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Thushara Veerasingam, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Location location location - room is very clean and smells great! The shuttle to the airport is only 5 min away. Its open for 24 hours and you only need to ask the front desk to set time to drive you to the airport.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello AndrewAnnie King, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. A positive experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to welcoming you back as soon as possible! Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Excellent service. Great breakfast before heading out to our morning flight. The shuttle was delayed due to the bridge being raised so the staff offered and payed for a taxi.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Nico Pharand, Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We truly pride ourselves on outstanding service, and we are glad we could deliver on that. We look forward to welcoming you back as soon as possible! Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Stayed here back in April with my mom on the 4th floor, it was great!! The sky train was a 10 min walk to get to other places, the bed was comfortable, loved the ice machine as we always got some ice lol breakfast was great, and the staff was great too! Thank you
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Emo Queens inc., Thank you for taking the time to write a review. A positive experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. Take care and stay safe. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: After our cruise, I wanted to stay an extra night in Vancouver because I just love this city! I chose this Holiday Inn Express because it was super close to the train station from the Port of Vancouver and also a $10 ride to the airport. It took us maybe 10 minutes to walk with our luggage - just dont listen to Google when it tells you to walk through the Costco lot on a Sunday. Because they were sold out the night before from other cruises, we were unable to check in early (10a) but Cindy checked our luggage and we went to Gastown for the day. After lunch (1p), I called to see if we could check in early and they said that we could. Cindy checked us in and thanked me for being an IHG member. She informed us about breakfast times and also asked if we needed a shuttle ride to the airport, which is complimentary! Yes, we definitely need a ride to the airport. It picks up on the 20 and 40 of every hour and I would suggest showing up 3 hours prior to your international flight. The room was so much larger than I expected and the bed was so comfortable! The bathroom is also larger than most other hotel rooms so that is really nice to have so much space. In addition to the king bed, we had a desk and chair, a wardrobe, a larger mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, chaise lounger, and a closet. They also provide Dove shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in refillable containers to be more eco friendly and offer a white noise machine to help you sleep. I would definitely stay here again due to how friendly the staff is, the proximity to public transportation, proximity to the Richmond Night Market (10 min walk), and how spacious and comfortable the room is.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Florence Vianzon, Thank you for taking the time to write a candid review. A positive experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. I will definitely pass along all your kind words to the rest of our staff. Take care and stay safe. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Great experience. We stayed here before and after our flights due to timing and being unable to catch our ferry back to the island. Clean rooms. Loved the sound machine that was in the room - lovely little attention to detail. Well stocked coffee and tea (keurig) as welll as th3 grab and go/continental breakfast downstairs. Also really loved the luggage scale in the lobby!! Would happily stay again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Candice Raines, Thank you for taking the time to write a candid review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: My fight was cancelled and my airline really screwed me over. Despite the hotel not having any rooms available the staff allowed me to stay safe in the lobby while trying to sort things out. They then offered me the shuttle to get to the airport at no cost. Considering that my airline quite literally left a young woman on the streets the staff at this hotel were a saving grace that helped make sure I was able to stay safe.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Bianca Kohlman, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. A positive experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. Take care and stay safe. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel. The staff that checked us in were very friendly. The rooms are not huge but they were very clean and the beds comfortable. Pretty good views from the higher floor rooms. The bathroom was very clean as well and everything in good shape. You can get free underground secure parking if youre a rewards member. Theres a Costco right across the street. The breakfast was decent. The elevators were fast and in good working order.

Had a short but great stay here. Staff was very kind and accommodating. We requested for a crib and they made sure there was a crib for our little one. Continental breakfast was decent as well. Would definitely stay here again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Nav V, Thank you for the 5-star review. We appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: The person in charge was so amazing to us. All the workers made sure we had everything we needed even though it was one stay. He felt bad about the shuttle bus, even though it was okay, and gave us free water and snacks. I do recommend this hotel. It was a very nice stay, quiet, and nice people.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello lilly, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and for recommending our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Excellent hotel if you are flying into Vancouver late. We were picked up from the airport at 1.30am by a very helpful and friendly driver. Staff at the hotel were helpful, the room was comfortable, clean and quiet and breakfast was delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Steve Bell, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. A positive experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. Take care and stay safe. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Stayed for one night before flying out of YVR. Room was clean and comfortable and the free breakfast was helpful before our morning flight. Staff were friendly and helpful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello olivia z, Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We truly pride ourselves on outstanding service, and we are glad we could deliver on that. We look forward to welcoming you back as soon as possible! Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Friendly and at the same time professional staff. Room service was on time and perfect. Shuttle service with no hassle at all as a plus. They were very accommodating and did not hesitate to approve our request to change our room as per our request. Everything was fine even in the first room, we wanted to have different room just to be on top level of the building. Thanks for your hospitality.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello faranak yousef navahsi, Thank you for the 5-star review. We appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: I loved this hotel. I stayed in a Marriott the following night once we reached our destination and realized  wow the holiday inn express really is way nicer.   The beds are amazingly comfortable, there s a fridge and a microwave, a coffee machine in your room, a white noise machine, nice furniture and the breakfast in the morning is very nice for a complimentary hotel breakfast. We used the fitness room and it was surprisingly really nice. Like I would be happy if that was the fitness room in my apartment! The staff was also very friendly and remembered me each time I saw them. I m thinking of going back to a holiday inn express now and canceling the rest of my stay at the Marriott!! Haha!!!

Lets be honest, you typically arent staying at this airport hotel for the view, but everything you do want, they do pretty well. The shuttle is every 30 mins from level 3 courtesy shuttle pick up area, easy to find, quick to the hotel lobby. Check in took 2 mins and then were in the room. Comfortable bed with soft sheets and feathery pillows, well laid out room, big closet... It does the simple things right for a low cost option. There is even an adjustable white noise machine if you want/need one to sleep. Ill definitely be back the next time Im stuck at YVR for the night.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Max M, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Ian at the front desk is an exceptional employee. My wife needed a room early and he went above and beyond to accommodate her. I was not able to get to Vancouver till late Friday night and he checked her in without a credit card because I had both of our cards with me. Ian was very understanding and helped her with the luggage and let her eat breakfast when she checked in. It was the complete opposite of customer service she got at the Travelodge down the street. I would have never booked a room for her there if I read the reviews. Whoever is in charge of this Holiday inn is doing a great job training their staff. If you are ever looking for a job, send me a message.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello D Tran, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. I will definitely pass your kind words to Ian directly. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Stayed here for 5 nights, had a wonderful experience. The staff were friendly and accommodating, special shout out to Eric and Joanna in particular for fantastic front desk service. The free daily breakfast is quite nice, I definitely recommend the pancakes. Cleaning and towel changes were done regularly and well. The complimentary shuttle saved us fares both ways to and from the airport (only a 10 minute ride). The nearest Skytrain station is Bridgeport, which is a less-than-10-minute walk. Add on another five minutes, and you can reach the Richmond Night Market! Our room had a Keurig, Microwave, Fridge, and TV available for use. Of particular note to me was the size of the TV. Most hotels Ive been to choose rather small screen sizes, but the size and placement of this one was near optimal for the beds. The only thing I can speak negatively about (which is out of their control) is the noise. You WILL hear the Costco across the street unload at night. My wife was able to sleep through it, but I was glad I packed ear plugs. I also recommend closing the bathroom door as night, as the ventilation system seems to channel in the noise from outside.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Jesse Chu, Thank you for taking the time to write a 5-star review and for recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: This is my favourite hotel ever!!! Honestly they are SO nice - and SO accommodating.  The hotel itself has the best beds that you hate to get up!!!  The bathrooms are perfect & the cosmetics are very nice as well.  Lots of lovely towels!  Have stayed there twice in the last 6 weeks and many times before.....  it is just perfect for a Vancouver Airport layover.... shuttle service is always on time & the drivers are amazing.  We ll definitely be back!!

The customer service at this hotel is excellent!! My flight was delayed and I was forced overnight in Vancouver. Theyre very helpful with their shuttle service and check in and check out time. They were also very quick to respond and make adjustments to my room as requested. The rooms are very comfortable and clean. Many thanks to the staff here!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Megan Noonan, Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Its something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Clean rooms, friendly staff, all at a good price. I have stayed several times at this hotel it has been a great experience every time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Mike Charlebois, We are delighted to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again for selecting our hotel. Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Stayed here before flying for 1 night. Very clean and comfortable stay. Shuttle to the airport wasnt available for an early flight but they booked and paid for a taxi.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Spencer Watson, Thank you for your positive review of our hotel. We truly pride ourselves on outstanding service, and we are glad we could deliver on that. We look forward to welcoming you back as soon as possible! Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: One of the best continental breakfast we ever had ...great way to start off a day
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello dreamspeaker13, We appreciate the high rating, thank you again for selecting our hotel. Regards Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: I am a liberal rater but that being said, rooms very clean, convenient for traveler on the go, desk steps away from front door, elevator right there, we were on 7th, fast elevator up, checkin on line, keys waiting for us so only seconds to check in and to get to our floor.  Newer decor, well kept.  Parking underground,  I had over height so they let me stay in long term.  We were here for ball games but the hotel would be covenient for airport.   Continental free buffet tmrw morning.   I am a fan of holiday inn, because they are predictably good to very good
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Ken B, Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your feedback. Eric Li MoD

reviews.review_text: Recently stayed at this hotel for one night while in transit from the airport. Very clean hotel. Friendly staff. Great big breakfast the next morning included in the price. Highly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Jean-Francois LeBlanc, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. A positive experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. Take care and stay safe. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: The staff was very useful and friendly. They made sure we got some coffee and breakfast before our free shuttle t he airport at 5am. The bed was comfortable, the room was clean, I would highly recommend this hotel to friends and family.

We have stayed at Holiday Inn Express at various locations across Canada and never had any issues but this one in in particular was the best. This is mainly due to the excellent customer service we received from the front desk staff. The person at the front desk went out of his way more than once to accommodate us. Will definitely stay there again if we get the opportunity.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Sukhvinder Malhotra, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Hotel was very clean, friendly staff, and in a great location. 5 -10 minutes walk to the Skytrain, free parking, and shuttle service to the airport. Breakfast was great and the check-in/check-out was simple and easy. Fast and efficient. Housekeepers were nice and quite witty, as the front desk staff was very considerate as well as friendly. Would recommend and definitely go again

Great Hotel.  Gym is very nice, probably the best gym, I have had at a hotel of this caliber.  Great breakfast, great customer service.   Bed was very comfortable,  cant say enough about this hotel - very good stay!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Brian Crews, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Wow! Stayed one night, to be able to park there while we flew to US. I did not expect to love this hotel so much. The bed was amazing! Such soft sheets squishy pillow and cloud of a bed. They also had a sound machine which I love! So many nice touches, and the room has some real thought put into it. I will be back. OH and a wonderful continental breakfast as early as 330am

Well worth booking!! We were at the airport and need accommodation last minute. Got it for $129.00 airport shuttle, clean room with 2 queen beds, huge selection on a hot breakfast. All staff were polite & kept everything spotless. Thank you everyone
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Roy Baarts, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: We had the free shuttle that picks you up at the Airport.  It runs every 1/2 hour from the hour. Check in was easy and staff was very freindly. Great free breakfast buffet with hot and cold options.Better than a continental breakfast.The room was very spacious with lots of storage.  The bed was very comfortable with 4 pillows on the bed. Into the pillow case was sewn soft or firm which makes it easy to pick your pillow. In room as well was a Keurig coffee maker with 4 pods so you didnt have to go down to the buffet. Great place and wed stay here again!

Loved it.  Rooms were nice, staff is super friendly.  We really liked the white noise machine in the room.  I slept like a baby. The bath and body works lotion is a nice touch.  Breakfast is served by the staff and rotates daily.  Between scrambled eggs, cheese omelettes, hard boiled eggs.  The meat was rotated to either have bacon, Turkey sausage or pork sausage. There was ample choice to satisfy everyone.  Apple, bananas, yogurt milk, juice, pancakes baked goods, toast and 3 different kinds of cereal.  The hotel is near the highway leading into Vancouver.  Parking is $12 but if youre and IHG member its free.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Hani Hoang, Thank you for taking the time to write a candid review. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Great location for travellers without a car. You can take the sky train from the airport and it is a 10 walk. I recommend cutting thru the costco parking lot to save time and it is lit when it gets dark.  The hotel has breakfast.  Parking is availble for a fee. The staff was very friendly. The linen was very good, duck filled pillows and high thread count sheets.  We felt very safe in that area vs downtown.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello J3 S, Thank you for taking the time to write a candid review. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Overall had a great stay. I was only here for a few hours to catch some sleep overnight. The room was very comfortable and was clearly recently updated, with tons of USB ports, modern furniture, and a very sleek washroom. The service was great, the person at the front prepared a to-go breakfast for me because I had to leave before the breakfast. She also booked me on the shuttle for the morning but it had filled up so she made sure a cab arrived for me and it was pre-paid, so I was very grateful for this service. The only issues I had were that it took a while to get ahold of the front desk when I called from the airport to arrange a shuttle, and the shower in the morning took a while to warm up. But overall, I would highly recommend if you need something close to the airport because of a layover, missed flight, etc.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello SN, Thank you for taking the time to write a candid review. I am glad you were able to maximize all our amenities and services. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: My wife and I have never felt so taken care of at a hotel before. Terry and the other front desk staff did an amazing job making sure all of our needs were met. The room was very nice and exceptionally clean. This location had easy access to the airport and a 24-hour Subway shop.

Friendly staff, clean room, complimentary breakfast. Ask for the room which does not face Costco as it is a bit noisy at night. I had an earplug, so I didnt change my room. Overall, I highly recommend it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Negar Azari, Thank you for the 5-star review and highly recommending our property. We appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: The hotel has underground parking, laundry on sight, a gym, and complimentary breakfast. The rooms had a fridge, microwave, kurig coffee machine, nice J.R. Watkins soaps, universal plugs on lamp, and a white noise machine. I noticed water on the floor near the entrance and it was the fridge that was leaking. Called the front desk and within minutes they were in the room swapping out the fridge and wiping the floor. Very friendly staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Carole Felipe, Thank you for taking the time to write a candid review and for recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Great hotel, we stayed here twice and the airport shuttle service was so convenient. The staff were friendly and had great suggestions for sightseeing.  Breakfast provided a good selection to start the day and coffee available 24 hrs in lobby.

A welcoming staff after a tiring flight is all that matters to me which signals the start of my stay will be wonderful. Room are super fresh and sparkling clean. Feels brand new. Breakfast is not ordinary. Finding a cinnamon bread is something different for me compare to a muffin that all other hotels offers. Transfers to and from airport is smooth and round the clock. There is also a station for printing documents which was very useful in printing or boarding pass before heading to the airport. A vending machine with drinks and snacks seals the gap of our hungry tummy. Lots of restaurants in the area that delivers to the hotel too. They would also all if you want to have a Wake up call. Superb service. Bathrooms with branded toiletries and complete accessories. Huge windows and comfy bed. Pillows are a highlight. Large tv and coffee corner. Microwave helps me a lot. Fridge kept my food fresh but I forgot them upon leaving. Overall satisfied and will be back.

I have been to a lot of hotels and this one is very consistent. Everytime it is clean, organized and the staff are polite. I have stayed here many times and I will continue to. They also have an airport shuttle which is nice.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello S P, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Being a loyal guest, we appreciate your business. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: On arrival, we were greeted by 2 friendly staffs, one of which is Eric. I had a situation *I totally caused it* and he immediately fixed it with a smile. Our room is clean and nice. The hotel, although small is very well kept. The AC is blasting cold air *tahnk goodness*.  customer service was superb, which is pretty hard to find nowadays. Definitely will come back again and will recommend this place to my friends and family.
The hotel is and feels clean. My room was impeccable, good wifi. Although the breakfast could have been better, the coffee was strong. Finally a good shuttle service to the airport
Great quality rooms and a nice breakfast! There was a small incident when we were checking out but the receptionist solved and handled it, the response deserves a 6 star
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Odin, Thank you for your positive review of our hotel. Thank you so much for your staff comment, we truly pride ourselves on outstanding service, and we are glad we could deliver on that. We look forward to welcoming you back as soon as possible! Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Such a restful stay. I had a 22.5 hr layover in YVR and was grateful to make a last-minute booking here. John at the front desk was very helpful and made the check-in process quick and seamless. The room was better than I expected, and the bed was incredibly comfortable. I slept very well, and awoke rested. The modified breakfast (due to COVID-19 adjustments) was a good start for the day. And when it came time to leave, the front desk staff (sorry, didnt catch his name) was kind to offer me a free taxi to the airport as the shuttle was going to be full. Overall a genuine 5-star stay. I would gladly return here when Im having a layover in YVR!

When we got to the Vancouver airport we called for the shuttle.   The front desk clerk said it was not running.  They told us to find a cab.  When we got to the hotel the front clerk met us by the door and paid the fair.  They were courteous and friendly.  The breakfast hot and delicious.  The beds very comfortable.  I highly recommend this hotel.

Fantastic hotel conveniently located near YVR Airport. I was very early for my check in.  Like 9am early.  I called and spoke with Jon Eric at the front desk.  He was very polite and didnt mind me asking for the favor of checking in early at all. He let me know that wouldnt be a problem.  After meeting him at the front desk I was beyond impressed with his service.  Great employee, fantastic facility.

My expectations were greatly exceeded. From check in staff and ease, to room cleanliness and updates -but especially the gym! The gym beats many upscale hotels.  Its big, has both machines and free weights and plenty of floor space. The free shuttle and included breakfast make this a no brainer, great value!
Convenient, bed was proper comfy wanted to say in it all day too !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Dom Coll, We sincerely value your feedback. Thank you again for selecting our hotel. Regard Eric Li GSM

reviews.review_text: Great value for the price. Location was awesome. Free transportation to the airport, parking is secure. Breakfast was more than I expected for the price. Would stay again for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Bobby lio, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. A positive guest experience is something that all our staff takes great pride in. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Recently rennovated hotel makes it really clean and modern. The staff is really friendly and helpful and the breakfast is surprisingly good. The location is convenient and close to the airport. Only downside is it is close to Costco and you can sometimes hear the trucks honking. I didnt really notice, but it might bother others.

We dropped our car off before leaving on a trip to Hawaii and then stayed a couple nights after returning to Vancouver. There is something to be said about a newly renovated hotel. The rooms are clean, contemporary, have lots of USB outlets, a white noise machine, and a large flat screen TV. There are no towel bars and the bathtub feels a bit cheap but those are minor and are the only negatives I could point out. The free breakfast is more than acceptable and includes bacon, turkey sausage, eggs, yogurt, fruit, cereal and a pancake machine. Long term parking is available for a pretty low rate if you stay at least one night at the hotel. This is accompanied by a free shuttle to and from the airport running every half hour. Regular guest parking is underground which is a perk. It was nice being across the street from Costco for a quick meal. Tim Hortons is also just around the corner. To top it off, the staff were friendly and quick to answer my questions. I would definitely stay here again.

Clean room, good service. Although, when we needed an early ride to airport the hotel got us a taxi as their shuttle didnt work out. The taxi was on the hotel. At the airport the cab driver wanted a voucher or something and insisted that it wasnt in his system that the hotel Will pay. We told him to sort it out with the hotel. Not sure if the hotel forgot to give us the vouchers it what, but it worked out for us.

My wife and me had very comfortable stay at this hotel that was clean and tidy. I must particularly acknowledge extraordinary length their Guest Service Manager - Jon Eric Laqui went to guide us through what was available inside and outside the hotel. His tips on planning our trip to see the must-sees at Vancouver was very useful, especially considering the time available to us.

This hotel is outstanding in every category. I have stayed at many hotels in my travels and I believe this one to be one of the best. It is super clean and the staff are genuinely courteous. The COVID-19 prevention measures in place are on point. I have recently had the opportunity to extend my stay - and rebooked without hesitancy.

Room was ready when we arrived early. Staff was polite and accommodating. Room was newly renovated and nice. Parking js convenient and security is more than expected.  Breakfast was great. Would recommend people stay here and would stay again when in the area.

Great small hotel close to the airport. There is complementary breakfest and coffee in the front lobby everyday. The staff are friendly and the rooms are clean. Due to the proximity of the airport, the planes landing and takeoffs noise can be annoying, the hotel does try to mitigate it with a white noise sound mechine in every room.

Nice room, good breakfast and friendly staff and service. 5 minute walk to Canada line metro station. Only negative is lack of convenience stores or restaurants in the area, but other than that, highly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Ifmars98, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and recently staying at our property. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely, Jon Laqui Guest Services Manager

reviews.review_text: Great rooms. Modern with the perfect amenities. Long term secure parking with reasonable rates. Shuttle to and from airport. Takes all the stress out of the trip. Great friendly staff.

Very modern, new & clean! Booked via hotwire for a super good deal (under $100 before fees and tax), was expecting a lower-tier normal hotel but this honestly feels nothing short of a 4-star hotel to us. Highly recommended. Room equipped with keurig, new thin TV with HDMI ports on the wall, cool lights, everything is brand new. Free breakfast from 6-10AM. Few minutes drive to airport. Easy to find street parking outside. (Parked just across the street, it was empty) free coffee 24/7 in the lobby. Best deal in town!!!

Stayed for 4 nights. Great stay.  Close to center and everything. The follow social distancing and mask procedures. Hand sanitizer in every floor.  They offer a hot breakfast every morning which is very good.  Parking is secure and 10 cad per day. Spacious, confortable and clean room.

Well I really liked it but the one thing that I did not like is that there are not enough wall outlets for charging your device. I really think that they need more.  The breakfast was great though and parking was easy. The elevators were fast and the key cards were extremely easy to use. -Thanks
